title: BlogPosts
description: Stores blog posts for the portal.

id.title: ID
id.description: Primary key, auto-incrementing blog post ID.

slug.description: URL-friendly unique slug for the blog post.

title.title: Title
title.description: Main headline of the blog post.

body_html.title: Body HTML
body_html.description: Rich-text HTML content of the blog post.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Comma-separated categories assigned to the blog post.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Comma-separated tags for the blog post.

publication_date.title: Publication Date
publication_date.description: Date and time when the blog post was published.

social_links.title: Social Links
social_links.description: JSON string storing array of social media URLs linked to the blog post.
